name: Ovum (TheGoldenNPC)
description:
Prologue:
When cleaning up the old attic you notice a loose floorboard, underneath the floor you find a strange looking map. The map contains ancient writing that you are not able to read, however it seems that there are markings on the map that show a location in the middle of a forest. You decide to investigate what is at this location. This is where your adventure begins, you walk up to an ancient structure that seems as if it has been waiting for you....

Go and explore the area and soon you will encounter strange pulsating eggs, however it is no small feat to reach them. By finding hidden objects, unlocking code switches, and well timed jumps you will be able to collect all of the eggs.   An altar is in the middle of the ancient structure where it seems the eggs can be placed. Are you able to discover the secrets of the ancient structure?

Roadmap:
The game is currently a protoype/demo.
Only the starting area is made and you can complete the first part of the game.
For the next areas I had the idea to add some additional mechanics for more intricate puzzles. However, currently I am planning to shift my priorities to new projects and thus do not plan to work on the other two areas. If this prototype gets some traction I might shift my priorities and continue with the other areas.

Controls:
E to interact with objects in the world
WASD for movement
Shift to sprint
Spacebar to jump
